summary: Contoso Wireless provides fast, reliable, and secure internet service with three different packages available: basic, standard, and premium. Each package offers different download and upload speeds and data caps. Additional features include free installation, technical support, access to an online customer portal, and an app to manage your account. There are discounts available for students and seniors, as well as a promotion for a free first month when signing up for a 12-month contract. Signing up can be done on the website or by calling 1-800-CONTOSO-WIRELESS.
